AbstractHTML: The <Package>Smallsemi</Package> package is a data library of semigroups    of small size. It provides all semigroups with at most 8 elements as well    as various information about these objects.

TitlePage.Acknowledgements:
We would like to thank Tom Kelsey for making this library possible by running all the initial computations in Minion .
The first author acknowledges financial support of the University of St Andrews. The second author acknowledges support of EPSRC grant number GR/S/56085/01.
TitlePage.Colophon:
If you find any bugs or have any suggestions or comments, we would
            very much appreciate it if you would let us know via our
            issue tracker (see
            <URL>https://github.com/gap-packages/smallsemi/issues</URL>).
